name: Tri-Bullet Hell
description:
My submission to the GDS 1UP Jam using the theme "Space".

You switch between three ships with different attributes and abilties in a bullet hell shooter.

Assets Used:

Space Background from OpenGameArt.org by leyren

Ship and Missile Sprites from kenney.nl

Font from DaFont

Music:

  • NightTime from the ModernLofiAmbient Pack by Cybeleaf
  • Retro Battle Theme 4  from the Action and Battle Music Pack by Scythuz
